title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 2, pt. 502 - Disclosure Of Information By Providers And Fiscal Agents
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 2, pt. 502 - Disclosure Of Information By Providers And Fiscal Agents

State Regulations
§ 502.1 - General requirements
§ 502.2 - Definitions
§ 502.3 - Determination of ownership or control percentages
§ 502.4 - Disclosure by providers and fiscal agents; information on ownership and control
§ 502.5 - Time and manner of disclosure
§ 502.6 - Disclosure by providers; information related to business transactions
§ 502.7 - Disclosure by providers; information on persons convicted of crimes
§ 502.8 - Additional time requirements for submission of requested information, and basis for penalties

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. E, art. 2, pt. 502

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§
20[d],34[3][f], 363-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
